register.description: Indicates the current system counter count value. It reflects the same value as the CNTCV_LO register.

bitfield.description: Indicates bits [31:0] of the system counter value.

register.description: Indicates the current system counter count value. It reflects the same value as the CNTCV_HI register.

bitfield.description: Indicates bits [63:32] of the system counter value.
